Name: Hotel Buiten
Review Text: Yesterday was a lovely day , so I toke a walk around the Sloterplas ( which is a lake). I stopped here to have lunch, they got a nice terrace  with a view over the lake and it is very peaceful here. Coffee is good and I ordered a salmon sandwich which was nice. Very nice atmosphere, I can recommend this place without a doubt.

Name: Hotel Buiten
Review Text: This’s a very different modern place on New-West Amsterdam. I like a lot their unique concept, friendly staff and good food. It is nice to spend time outside on their terrace at a summer day. …

Name: Hotel Buiten
Review Text:
Wonderful place great food and atmosphere ,
And service is great and helpful!

Name: Hotel Buiten
Review Text: Very nice terras, located just next to a huge natural reserve, with lakes and places to swim, lay on the grass or have a nice picnic. The service is really good and the food is nice and tasty. Not a lot of variety though, and prices are a bit over rated! But it's Amsterdam!! Much recommended! 🥛

Name: Hotel Buiten
Review Text: The food is good, the staff was really kind. Nice place to relax. Today I had a confit de canard.. it was delicious.. the duck was really tasty. I love this place....

Name: Hotel Buiten
Review Text: Perfect spot for a little break during a walk around the Sloterplas. Lovely staff and a nice menu.

Name: Hotel Buiten
Review Text:
Very nice restaurant, friendly staff, great location and delicious food!
Although the tables outside had a view, We sat indoors which had an authentic characteristic to it! The food was fresh and tasty. Recommend it!

Name: Hotel Buiten
Review Text: Cozy and cool place. Lunch and dinner menus are separated as 12.00 - 17.00 and 17.00 after. Drinking options are various and also meals are tasty. Nice and kind staff.

Name: Hotel Buiten
Review Text: A very nice restaurant in the neighborhood. Can maybe improve their food (for instance, they have a ceviche dish which is NOT what its aiming to be. But other than that its quite nice there - great coffee, very nice for kids and a brilliant vibe in the summer with their summer terrace. I like it there very much.

Name: Hotel Buiten
Review Text: Kind of hipster place, but props for starting a restaurant in this location!! Also props for the kitchen, they have a very interesting menu. I've been here a couple of times and staff was always very friendly (for Amsterdam standards).
